citations.narrative:
Maintenance equipment such as a rake, spade and scoop shovel were being stored on hooks on the exterior portion of
the primary enclosure fence housing a male gray wolf. There is risk for injury if the animal manipulates the equipment
through the fence. Facility structures must be maintained to prevent injury to animals involved.
Correct by 22 May 2023.

Chemicals used for cleaning such as bleach were stored on the exterior portion of the primary enclosure chain-link fence
housing a female gray wolf. The wire basket holding the chemicals was located above the drinking water receptacle for
the animal and is a potential risk for injury if spillage occurs given the open weave of the chain-link fence separating the
water receptable and chemicals stored. Facilities should be kept in good repair to protect the animals from injury and
facilitate prescribed husbandry practices.
Corrected at time of inspection dated 10 May 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
Maintenance equipment such as a rake, spade and scoop shovel were being stored on hooks on the exterior portion of 
the primary enclosure fence housing a male gray wolf.  There is risk for injury if the animal manipulates the equipment 
through the fence. Facility structures must be maintained to prevent injury to animals involved. 
 
Correct by 22 May 2023. 
3.131(c) 
   
Sanitation. 
Chemicals used for cleaning such as bleach were stored on the exterior portion of the primary enclosure chain-link fence 
housing a female gray wolf.  The wire basket holding the chemicals was located above the drinking water receptacle for 
the animal and is a potential risk for injury if spillage occurs given the open weave of the chain-link fence separating the 
water receptable and chemicals stored.  Facilities should be kept in good repair to protect the animals from injury and 
facilitate prescribed husbandry practices.   
 
Corrected at time of inspection dated 10 May 2023.

This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
